snippet: FREED--Judith, on March 28, peacefully at home, age 94. An original, endlessly curious, a passionate believer in social justice, loving mother of Lisa Freed and Kayce Freed Jennings. Our world is already less interesting without her in it. 1/3
lead_paragraph: FREED--Judith, on March 28, peacefully at home, age 94. An original, endlessly curious, a passionate believer in social justice, loving mother of Lisa Freed and Kayce Freed Jennings. Our world is already less interesting without her in it. 1/3
